title: Maharani Kundan Choker - A Regal Adornment
materials: 22K Gold Plated Base. Set with high-quality Kundan Polki diamonds and genuine Burmese Ruby droplets. Accented with freshwater pearls. Features a Hyderabadi Antique Polish for a vintage appeal.
features: This exquisite choker showcases traditional Kundan setting techniques, with each Polki meticulously placed by skilled artisans. The graduated Ruby droplets add a touch of rich color and movement. The design features a central pear-shaped pendant, surrounded by intricate Polki work, inspired by Mughal artistry. The freshwater pearls lining the top edge provide a delicate contrast and enhance the regal look. The antique finish gives it a timeless charm, reminiscent of royal heirlooms.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Ideal for a bride's Muhurtham look or a special Seemantham ceremony. Also suitable for upscale events and formal gatherings.
description: A testament to Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage, this choker combines traditional techniques with exquisite materials. The Kundan setting ensures exceptional brilliance, while the Burmese Rubies add a touch of luxury and prosperity. Its durable construction guarantees longevity, making it a cherished piece for generations. It exudes elegance and cultural significance, making it a true statement piece.
